name: cassandra
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache Cassandra has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/usage/services/cassandra/

postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache Cassandra service has been uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/usage/services/cassandra/uninstall to remove any persistent state if required.
